actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the thanks of the Senate to the Honorable Strom Thurmond for his service as President Pro Tempore of the United States Senate and to designate Senator Thurmond as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the United States Senate.

summary.text: Thanks Senator Strom Thurmond for his dedication and commitment during his service as President pro Tempore. Designates Senator Thurmond as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the U.S. Senate.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the thanks of the Senate to the Honorable Strom Thurmond for his service as President Pro Tempore of the United States Senate and to designate Senator Thurmond as President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the United States Senate.
